The hidden underground party reports to you
Base development

A unique project for the Lovinian Rebellion. It can be enabled after building a "Rebel Camp". Upon completion, it provides the same [ICON_GreatGeneral] points as the standard Camp project, but provides an additional [ICON_Food] and [ICON_Science] points equal to 15% of the production spent.
Spark of Resistance

+15% Population Growth Rate, 1 [ICON_Production] Productivity and 1 [ICON_Science] Science per [ICON_Citizen], +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking enemies in friendly territory. [NEWLINE]Cities produce 5% more [ICON_Gold], [ICON_Production] Productivity, [ICON_Culture], and [ICON_Science] when Happy, and 10% more [ICON_Gold], [ICON_Production], [ICON_Culture], and [ICON_Science] when Ecstatic. Low Happiness Output Penalty Reduced by 25%.
Revolutionary flag

As one of the early leaders of the rebellion, Comrade Steyou has a strong appeal. Gain +3 Influence Points, +7 additional military unit recovery in any territory, +100% [ICON_Production] Production if war has been declared or a city has been liberated in the past 10 turns.
Revolutionary flag
Any terrain +7 recovery
Rebel Army
The rebels
Lovinian Rebellion
Stiyo
Let the sparks of resistance burn across Lovinia!

Since the founding of Lovinia, the political struggle between the royal family and the nobles has never stopped. Although the former Queen of Lovinia, Bran XXVI, tried to reconcile the conflicts between the royal family and the nobles, she was powerless and achieved no results.

In order to completely control the country, the ambitious nobles of Lovinia launched a military coup. Led by the Valen family, the nobles assassinated the then Queen of Lovinia, Bran XXVI, at the Knights' Assembly. The royal family and royalist forces were forced to retreat to the White City and its vicinity, which became the fuse for the subsequent chaos in Lovinia.

Since the Lovinian nobles passed the law to force the subhumans to be enslaved, the subhumans of Lovinia have never stopped resisting. With the assassination of Bran XXVI, the domestic situation in Lovinia became increasingly turbulent, and the subhumans who had been oppressed by the Lovinian nobles finally rose up. This uprising was the largest and most influential anti-aristocratic revolution in history.

The rebel army was composed of subhuman slaves oppressed by Lovinia's Subhuman Slave Law, and even many oppressed lower-class human civilians joined them. They ignited the first fire of the Lovinian Revolution.

The adverse effects of the armed coup launched by the nobles created chaos in Lovenia. The nobles fought against the royal family and the rebel forces, and it was urgent to build a completely unified Lovenia.

This MOD is based on the MOD "Desolate Hope" of "World Conqueror 4", which tells a series of war stories on the planet called "Desonglat". The original MOD "Desolate Hope" is still under development, and the author made this MOD out of interest. Since this is the first time to make a MOD, many settings are incomplete, please forgive me.

Dear Comrade Stiyo, during your inspection, you witnessed the miserable lives of the lower-class civilians and subhuman slaves in Lovinia. The suffering of the people hurt your heart, and you betrayed your class and decided to change this country. Now, a brand-new revolutionary force has been assembled under your command. For a democratic and equal new Lovinia, let us spread the flames of revolution!

Steyou, commander of the Lovinian Royal Army, commander of the Lovinian Rebellion, and one of the founders of the Voice of the People. Born into a prestigious aristocratic family, she was pampered and thought everything in the world was so beautiful until the tenth Mobis-Lovinian War came.

When the team she led passed through the residential area of ​​the city, she found that everything here was completely opposite to what she had imagined: people lived in crowded apartments, beggars begged the knights for a little pitiful food, and the bodies of subhumans with their stomachs ripped open were everywhere, with nothing inside...

After the war, Stieu began to travel around Lovenia, investigating the living conditions of ordinary civilians. He used his own funds to shelter the poor who were maliciously persecuted by the nobles, and led the Knight Guards to destroy the markets that sold subhuman slaves.
On a drizzling afternoon, after Steyou and her escort knights left the large slave market run by her family, she realized that she needed a power, a power that could change the world.
Asian Jungle Guerrilla
Jungle Ambush
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting in Forests and Rainforests.
Woodland Ranger
There is no [ICON_Movement] movement penalty when moving in a forest or rainforest.
Take the unexpected
Double Flanking Bonus
Military Science provides +20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Part normalization provides +20 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Navigation System grants +20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Rebel Camp

Lovinian Rebellion Special District, replaces the Barracks, -50% construction cost, +1 upgrade for military units produced by the city owning this district, 2 [ICON_Science] Science value for adjacent academies, 2 [ICON_Production] Productivity for adjacent industrial districts, +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing. [NEWLINE] This district is built regardless of population limits, cannot be built next to the city center, and is not a special district. Once built, it provides the special project "Base Construction".

The rebels were composed of long-oppressed subhuman slaves and lower-class human civilians. They adopted flexible guerrilla tactics, starting from the countryside and surrounding towns, so their camps were also quite simple, making it easy to follow the guerrilla warfare.
Revolutionary Program

A unique building for the Lovinian Rebellion that replaces the Monument. It provides an additional 0.5 Loyalty (1.5 total), 3 [ICON_Production] Production, 3 [ICON_Culture] Culture, and 1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenities.

The people of Lovinia knew that it was these arrogant yet greedy nobles who caused the chaos in Lovinia and their tragic fate, which also meant that this revolution was a resolute anti-aristocratic revolution.
Fighting oppression

A civilization that likes to maintain peace with surrounding civilizations will not initiate wars other than liberation wars, city-state defense wars, and revenge wars, unless its neighbors are treacherous.
As a person, I appreciate your friendship, we really need solidarity at this time.
Forgive me for rejecting your friendship, but I still have doubts about your motives.
I hope to have a good relationship with you, both professionally and privately.
Great, I hope we can become good friends and comrades.
Is it not possible? Are you dissatisfied with our ability, or do you look down on our background?
Oh, once again, how many times will the rebels suffer betrayal like this?
Your forces have become the enemy of all the people of Lovenia, and the rebels will launch a resolute counterattack!
I have accepted your trade delegation in the hope that they will adapt to the harsh and austere environment of the Rebellion.
We are very sorry, but we are unable to accept your trade mission.
In order to promote mutual trust, we are willing to send representatives there, and we hope that you can accept the sincerity of the rebels.
Can't even establish the basic trust? What a noble face...
Your actions are no different from those greedy nobles. You have completely stood against the people. [NEWLINE] (Condemn you)
Hello! Nice to meet you. I'm Stieu, and I'm dedicated to liberating the people of Lovinia.
Would you like to visit the base near the rebels? The people here are simple and honest, and you will like it here.
It seems that you are a leader who pays attention to people's livelihood, which is good.
The Rebellion is committed to seeking more like-minded people. How about we exchange information about the capital? This will facilitate further cooperation in the future.
Very good!
You have done a good job. The impact of the war has been too severe and people now have a chance to recuperate.
(You maintain peace with the surrounding civilization)
Steyou is very pleased that you maintain peace with the surrounding civilization
War only brings pain and the aggressors cannot be forgiven.
(You are at war with the surrounding civilizations)
You are at war with the surrounding civilizations, and Steyou is very unhappy
The rebels hope to form an alliance with you to add strength to liberate the people of Lovinia and fight against the nobles.
A wise choice. I hope you will understand how powerful the power of the people is in the future.
Well, we will accompany you no matter how long you fight, until the day of victory!
Please stop, the people have suffered enough...
Welcome, the rebels are willing to provide convenience to reliable friends.
No, we will not allow such aristocratic people to pass through our borders.
Hello, the rebel troops would like to pass through your border. Can you let us pass through your border?
The militia at the base reported to me that your troops are operating outside our borders fully armed. Is this a threat to the rebels?
The people of Lovinia could only struggle in oppression and war in the end...
Do you also look down on us "despicable" rebels like those nobles?
Thank you, thank you for your support to the rebels and the people.

They come from the countryside and forests, and are elite troops who are good at mobile warfare. They can cleverly use terrain offensives to fight after discovering the enemy. It takes more military force than usual to eliminate them.
Base development
Base development

A unique project for the Lovinian Rebellion. It can be enabled after building a "Rebel Camp". Upon completion, in addition to providing the same [ICON_GreatGeneral] points as the standard camp project, it also provides 15% of the spent production capacity in [ICON_Food] and [ICON_Science] points.

The construction and development of the base is a very important matter for the rebel army. Both population growth and technological development require a lot of investment and long-term construction, and cannot be rushed.
Guerrilla tactics
We have no guns or cannons, but the enemy makes them for us.
Anti-encirclement and suppression
Interspersed detours
Revolutionary Enthusiasm
Sparrow War
After killing an enemy unit, gain [ICON_Gold] coins equal to 100% of the unit's base [ICON_Strength] combat power.
+5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when flanked.
Increased mobility when moving on hilly terrain.
Being injured does not reduce combat effectiveness.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, and +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against ranged attacks.

The rebels were composed of subhuman slaves and lower-class human civilians. They had no strong industrial strength and financial resources, so where did they get the equipment and ammunition to continue the resistance? Of course, they attacked the enemy forces and seized their weapons and equipment for their own use. If we didn't have guns and cannons, the enemy would make them for us.

The rebel base was a thorn in the side of the aristocratic army. They kept launching attacks on the rebel base, but the rebels were always able to break their encirclement and suppression time and time again with flexible tactics.

Not only forests, but also mountains are where the rebel forces are active. Familiar with the terrain and with strong willpower, they can always maneuver quickly on rugged paths and attack the enemy from angles the enemy can't imagine.

The subhumans and humans who had been oppressed for a long time had a lot of anger and fire in their hearts. After the anti-aristocratic uprising broke out, this anger and fire became an indelible revolutionary enthusiasm in the hearts of the rebel soldiers. This supported the poorly equipped rebel troops and they would not give up fighting even when they were surrounded.

The infantry units of the rebel army possess flexible and maneuverable tactics. Sparrow warfare is the guerrillas' powerful weapon against powerful enemies. The guerrillas and the militia form small teams that gather and disperse from time to time. While confusing and restraining the enemy, they can also deal a powerful blow to the enemy.
+{2_num} [ICON_Science] Science gained from adjacent rebel camps.
+{2_num} [ICON_Production] Production from adjacent rebel camps.

The development started from the western region of Lovinia (West Continent) where the city of Lovinia is located. There are rebel bases in the east and west of Lovinia (West Continent and Central Continent).
Before the start of the 11th Lomo War, the rebels controlled at least 30% of Lovinia (although most of them were underdeveloped rural areas).
There is no way to count (the original author has no time to set this)
Knada (the first major city captured by the rebels)
